data.name: Adventures of Chris
data.detailed_description:
THE GAME

Adventures of Chris is a story-driven adventure platformer heavily influenced by 90's cartoons. Explore 8 initial world locations in any order as you build your character from a weak kid into a plausible video game hero. Chris's floating mechanic allows for unique platforming challenges, and he can learn increasingly powerful spells and special moves as he travels the globe - as well as purchase upgrades from the merchants of the Kingdom of Lost Balloons. Explore a world like something out of a Saturday morning cartoon, fight ninja cats and cyborg penguins, uncover a sinister story, and prove your capabilities to a skeptical population - with laughs along the way!


THE STORY

One day in 1995, seven children around the world mysteriously vanish, including a nerdy, overweight 7th-grader named Chris. Finding himself in a remote part of Transylvania, he soon becomes lost in a Saturday morning cartoon universe of magic and villains. When one of those villains transforms him into a helium balloon as an insult, Chris (ever the optimist) reinterprets his transformation as the superpower of flight, and floats off to save the other kidnapped children.

data.short_description: Hi, I'm Chris! I may look like an overweight, nerdy kid who got turned into a balloon, but actually, I'm reasonably awesome! You should give my adventure platformer game a try - I need your help to beat the Clan of the Black Yarnball, Large Urchin, and, of course, Count Junior. I mean, it's all his fault anyway.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
